personalInfo.name: Chris
personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate web developer, making useful application using the latest technologies!

responsabilities: Team lead for a project called Equine Exchange.
Was responsible for maintaining the project architecture, managing the repo, rolling out releases and test builds.
Worked on new features, fixed bugs, and managed the development team to make sure requirements were met.
Designed search algorithms, subscriptions through in app purchases, and push notifications
Backend Technologies: NodeJs | Firebase | Firebase Cloud Functions
Frontend Technologies: ReactJs | ReactNative | Xcode | Android Studio
Release Platforms: App Store Connect | Google Play Console
Responsible for designing, developing and maintaining a group of applications used in the retail industry.
As part of a 4-man team, I help make technical decisions about which technologies used in each project and how the team will works.
Backend Developer: NodeJs | MYSQL | MongoDB | Firebase
Responsible for managing an installation team and meeting deadlines on time
Provided great customer support, and walked customers through the process start to finish.  Very few cancellations

interests.title: Hobbies üòÑ
interests.firstBlock: Apart from developing, I enjoy most of my time video-gaming and boxing.  I'm a member at a local boxing club and train regularly
interests.secondBlock: I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technolgy advancements in the frontend and backend web technology development world and coding in my personal projects! üôåüë®‚Äçüíª

projectsInfo.name: Equine Exchange
projectsInfo.description: Equine Exchange is an app built in React Native, designed for buying and selling rodeo horses, and keeping up to date on rodeo events.

projectsInfo.name: Draftrr
projectsInfo.description: Draftrr is a writing app that gamifies the writing process for users on their first draft.

projectsInfo.name: Cha-Ching
projectsInfo.description: Cha Ching is an invoicing and pay tracking system for self-employed and independent contractors

projectsInfo.name: Hero Builds
projectsInfo.description: Hero builds is a side project that shows popular builds for Dota 2
